name: Blast Royale
description:
Blast Royale is a paintball shooter in which you have to eliminate all other opponents,
you can also put together your own characters and choose weapons, There are searchable ammunition boxes and health stations that regenerate your life, and you can activate 2 super skills in the game that you can research and level up in the skill tree
The co-op part of the game mainly focuses on Lasertag, in which you can level up and manage your skills in order to give your best in combat, and this game mode is only playable with 8 people
